content.rendered:
We have won the Deloitte Technology Fast 50 award for the fastest growing young company in Central Europe and we are looking for new colleagues who will help us move our project forward! Take the opportunity to take part in the rapidly growing startup FTMO.com. We are looking for a new colleague who would participate in our growth by helping us with data analysis. The ideal candidate is an individual with an analytical mindset and team spirit, interested in financial markets. Someone who would love to become part of a meaningful and exciting project with high ambitions.

What will be your agenda?

  • Provide business and trading-related data analysis
  • Development of dashboarding and reporting applications
  • Gather data and manage databases

What are we expecting from you?

  • Analytical mind: Proven analytical, interpretative, and problem-solving skills
  • Minimum 1-year experience with Python
  • Efficiently write maintainable SQL and Python code
  • Experience with Jupyter Notebooks
  • Experience with GIT
  • Proficiency in English or Czech language
  • Advantage: Experience in web development and data mining/scraping

And why work for us?

  • You will be working for a fast-growing start-up/fintech, where you will find 130+ motivated people. We’re rather friends than colleagues and we share the same goals.
  • We encourage self-realisation, we’re flexible and open to new ideas. Each of us can influence the project while working on ourselves and move professionally forward.
  • Thanks our working pace, we can assure you that you won’t get bored with us.
  • We will train you on financial markets and all the other related topics so you know our business.
  • Working from home is not a problem (it always depends on the agreement), but we prefer to work in the office – Quadrio offices will make you feel like at home as well.
  • Free snacks and refreshments (both healthy and sweet) are available for everyone in the office.
  • We’ll offer you a Multisport card, feel free to join our FTMO Running club!
  • Providing appropriate HW goes without saying (laptop, 2 monitors, adjustable desk, ergonomic chair). We want to make sure you’ll feel comfortable in our Quadrio offices.
  • Meeting room for poker and board games. Or you can sing karaoke with us.


Did we catch your attention? Let us know!
Send us ➡️ your CV or LinkedIn profile and we’ll gladly meet you, regardless whether in person or online.
